2.name: Aileen Rizo
2.title: Research Associate in Mathematics Education
2.company: AIMS Center for Math and Science
2.shortBio: Aileen Rizo is a Research Associate for the AIMS Center. She has worked in math education for 20+ years in roles such as...
2.bio: Aileen Rizo is a Research Associate for the AIMS Center. She has worked in math education for 20+ years in roles such as – classroom teacher, curriculum designer, educational consultant, and adjunct faculty. She has also served in state capacities with the California Department of Education as a Math Reviewer and is currently a Network Educator for the Smarter Balanced Digital Library. Aileen earned a Masters in Educational Technology from Northern Arizona University and her second Masters in Mathematics Education from Fresno Pacific University. She is an advocate for the equity of women and girls for which she was awarded a Trailblazer:Catalysts for Change by local/state government representatives. Aileen’s passion in STEM fields fueled her to realize the importance of providing children with powerful educational experiences. Her own children inspire her current work with the early math team in an effort to bring equitable math experiences to young children.

1.name: Saori Ichikawa-Jansen
1.title: Data Analyst
1.shortBio: Saori is a Data Analyst at Fresno Unified School District and co-founded CoderGirlz
1.bio: Saori is a Data Analyst at Fresno Unified School District and co-founded CoderGirlz, an after-school coding club for girls. She works in the district's IT department, organizes the annual Tournament of Technology and is deeply invested in addressing the underrepresentation of women and minorities in STEM fields. Saori earned a Masters in Mathematics from California State University, Fresno and teaches part-time at local community colleges.

3.name: Laura Huisinga
3.title: Assistant Professor
3.shortBio: Laura Huisinga is an artist, designer, and educator. She currently teaches in the Multimedia and Interaction BFA..
3.bio: Laura Huisinga is an artist, designer, and educator. She currently teaches in the Multimedia and Interaction BFA design track at Fresno State. She has a passion for strong UX design and is interested in how augmented reality could be used in education. Laura has her MFA in graphic design from Iowa State University and has worked as a front-end-developer in Des Moines, Iowa. She is currently finishing her PhD at Iowa State University in Human Computer Interaction and loves teaching at Fresno State.

4.name: Monisha Edwards
4.title: Founder and Director of Brand Development
4.shortBio: Monisha Edwards is a talented individual with a professional background in Marketing and Brand Development....
4.bio: Monisha Edwards is a talented individual with a professional background in Marketing and Brand Development. She started her first company at the tender age of 19, and is now the Founder and Director of Brand Development for Truth Branding Agency. Monisha is an active servant of the community, especially Downtown Fresno, and is an alumna of F.L.Y.P. (Fresno’s Leading Young Professionals) Downtown Academy Class of 2016.

5.name: Rusty Robison
5.title: Professor
5.shortBio: Rusty Robison is a scientist trapped inside an artist's mind. She's terrible at math, but loves programming...
5.bio: Rusty Robison is a scientist trapped inside an artist's mind. She's terrible at math, but loves programming. She is a professor of Interactive/Multimedia Design at Fresno State and a mother of a two-year-old boy. She holds a BA in Creative Writing from Sarah Lawrence College and an MFA in Design and Technology from Parsons School of Design. Currently, she is obsessed with virtual and augmented reality.

7.name: Siamak "Ash" Ashrafi
7.title: Fashionable Health Tech
7.shortBio: Ash - CTO @ ZoeWave building physiologically intelligent clothing called ZoeWear...
7.bio: Ash - CTO @ ZoeWave building physiologically intelligent clothing called ZoeWear.  Combining biotech, mobile and fashion to build clothing that keeps people healthy while looking great Zoe("life")Wear "wearable for life" is built on his experience in all three fields

6.name: Shel Moore
6.title: Digital Marketer & Entrepreneur
6.shortBio: Creative, ingenious tech marketer, writer, & artist who’s passionate about integrity, family, & love...
6.bio: Creative, ingenious tech marketer, writer, & artist who’s passionate about integrity, family, & love. Co-founder and Chief Marketing Officer of Moore Than SEO, Shel Moore, is a digital marketing veteran with over 20 years experience. Shel is also Mom to an amazing son, who happens to be on the Autism spectrum. She enjoys sharing her journey to uplift and help families & others of all ages also working to improve and enrich the lives of loved ones living with Autism.

8.name: Kelly Lamb
8.title: CEO of Tech Company - Helpfulist
8.shortBio: Kelly Lamb is the Founder and CEO of Helpfulist. She began her passion...
8.bio: Kelly Lamb is the Founder and CEO of Helpfulist. She began her passion as an entrepreneur began in high school when working with start-up companies creating and executing long-term strategic/business plans for them.  She has worked in the fields of Business Strategy, Marketing Management, Promotions, and Advertising for over 9 years. At the age of 17, Kelly was the youngest Marketing Manager in Central California for an industry-leading tax company . Kelly is recognized for her innovative and unorthodox marketing & strategic planning methods. Along with being the CEO of Helpfulist, Kelly stays active in the community mentoring teenagers in leadership and building their own future businesses.

9.bio: Full stack developer in Fresno and a user group junkie. He was C/C++ CAD software developer in the past and actively worked and working with .NET, Java and Python technology stacks including JS/HTML5/CSS front end (besides many).

11.name: Alison Haugan
11.title: President/Co-founder; Strategic Business Advisor; Speaker
11.shortBio: Alison Haugan is a pioneering entrepreneur, strategic business coach, and speaker....
11.bio: Alison Haugan is a pioneering entrepreneur, strategic business coach, and speaker. She has spent the last 19 years as Co-Founder and President of a nationwide, satellite-based communications provider, OptiStreams, Inc., which was ranked #140 on Inc. Magazine’s Inc. 500 fastest growing privately held companies in America list for 2004, and continues to serve unique connectivity needs in rural areas.She coaches and works with entrepreneurs (and wanna-be entrepreneurs) and   professionals who are ready to “up their game” to take their business/career to the next level, increase financial stability and reserves, reduce stress, and leverage their personal power for stronger credibility, career advancement, and vision achievement.She also works with business owners and organizations to help them achieve more respectful, responsible and profitable work environments through her unique message of civility and virtues in business Contact her for more information and availability.
